Student Positions

The University Library hires student assistants throughout the academic year, including the summer. Both work-study and non-work-study positions are posted on Handshake.

High School Internship

The Library's high school student internship program provides high school students with the opportunity to explore the wide array of career opportunities in libraries. No prior experience is necessary or expected. Internships are paid positions.

Volunteer Opportunities

We welcome volunteers to help with Library programs and services, such as working in our special collections digitization unit or assisting our cataloging teams with translation of modern languages. There are many other opportunities as well; for more information, contact Suzanne Bombard, Volunteer Coordinator.
